title: 99% Invisible-53- The Xanadu Effect
description: What happens when we build big? Julia Barton remembers going to the top floor of Dallas’s then-new city hall when she was teenager. The building, designed by I.M. Pei, is a huge trapezoid jutting out over a wide plaza. Julia … Continue reading →
author: roman@99pi.org (Roman Mars)
